name: Hatchake Ayayo-san 1-2-3
overview: Includes the first three Hacchake Ayayo-san games. The first two games (Hacchake Ayayo-san & Hacchake Ayayo-san 2: Ikenai Holiday) allow the player to choose between the ports of the respective versions for PC-88 and Sharp X68000, the latter (Hacchake Ayayo-san 3) having technically higher-quality visuals.
